name: Wild West TD Tower Defense
description:
Love western games? Welcome to a stylized poly-art western world Tower Defense.

Defend settlement, save block city:
In the wild west, you need to protect a wild western city from enemy battle machines. As great cowboy takes command. Destroy enemies machine, let the enemy train off the rail.

Stylized polygon models:
- Polygonal citizens
- Low-poly turrets and towers
- Poly vehicles and battle machines
- Low-poly wild west environment
- Color effects

Build fort and towers:
Gather gold and build towers along the enemy way to protect the wild west settlement. Improve towers and builds to create a better city fort. Do not let the enemies battle machine break through and plunder the treasure!

Enemies battle machine:
- Low-poly Cart
- Western Locomotive
- Wild West Coach
- Cowboy Wagon

Amazing polygonal block graphics:
- Detailed poly environments
- Interactive elements
- Low-poly models
- Poly turrets and towers

Polygonal Tower Defense!

Turrets type:
- Gunman
- Bandit
- Slow Tower
- Lady Shotgun
- Gold Mine
- Gunfighters

Best Tower Defense cowboy games waiting for you!
